name: Breakdown (itch) (MicyoZ)
description:
Hold in your breakdown by destroying your apartment! But what happens when there's nothing left to break?

WASD movement, but one direction at a time

E to interact with things

Escape to restart

I started working on this game 2 days before the Curdle Jam ended. Instead of quitting the Jam, I decided to try it, even though I had less time.

 I also tried to create a game without ANY  external reference for the first time, so no tutorials, and no opening my other projects.

It's a short game, but the actual point is to let the player blow off steam by destroying my *beautiful* apartment xD. So I hope you enjoy it!

Shoutout to Chandy57 for helping with the name

Shoutout to Rexary for helping with the Idea
